summary: I WAS DRIVING ON FEBRUARY 12TH 2019 AND HAD MY DEFROSTERS WHEN ALL OF A SUDDEN I HEARD A LOUD POP AND LOOKED IN THE REARVIEW MIRROR TO SEE MY BACK WINDOW SHATTERED RIGHT OVER MY 2 YEAR OLD DAUGHTER. THIS IS THE SECOND TIME THAT THIS HAS HAPPENED IN THE PAST 3 YEARS. I STOPPED AND GOT OUT AND TOUCHED THE WINDOW AND BURNT MY HAND WITH HOW HOT IT WAS.
